sentences.en: A quick movement across the aisle caught his eye.
sentences.cn: 有个人影在走道里一闪而过，引起了他的注意。

sentences.en: An observant doctor can often detect depression from expression, posture, and movement.
sentences.cn: 善于观察的医生常常能从人的表情、姿势以及动作诊察出抑郁症。

sentences.en: As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
sentences.cn: 她转过身，瞥见有个东西从草地上穿了过去。

sentences.en: Dutch colonial authorities imprisoned him for his part in the independence movement.
sentences.cn: 荷兰殖民当局因他参加独立运动而把他关押了起来。

sentences.en: His eyes bored into her, paralysing her, robbing her of movement.
sentences.cn: 他双眼凝视着她，令她全身瘫软，不能动弹。

sentences.en: In the 50s, Rauschenberg anticipated the conceptual art movement of the 80s.
sentences.cn: 上世纪50年代时，劳申伯格就早早地预见到了80年代的概念艺术运动。

sentences.en: It's part of a broader nationalist movement that's gaining strength throughout the country.
sentences.cn: 这是一场正在全国范围内日益壮大的更为广泛的民族主义运动的一部分。

sentences.en: Monks shave their heads, as do devotees of the Hare Krishna movement.
sentences.cn: 和尚要剃度，克利须那派教徒也一样。

sentences.en: reports of troop movements in the area
sentences.cn: 该地区部队动向的报告

sentences.en: the civil rights movement of the 1960s
sentences.cn: 20世纪60年代的民权运动

sentences.en: the dancer’s graceful movements
sentences.cn: 舞蹈演员优美的动作

sentences.en: The movement took him by surprise, and he pitched forward.
sentences.cn: 这一动使他冷不防地向前摔倒。

sentences.en: There has been a substantial amount of factionalism within the movement.
sentences.cn: 运动中有大量的宗派之争。

sentences.en: There have been persistent rumours of quarrels within the movement.
sentences.cn: 运动团体内部存在争执的传闻始终未断。

sentences.en: They actually monitor the movement of the fish going up river.
sentences.cn: 他们实际上在观测鱼向上游的迁移活动。

sentences.en: They are accused of organising and financing an underground youth movement.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控组织并资助地下青年运动。

sentences.en: They have their own independence movement which is gathering strength.
sentences.cn: 他们自己发起了独立运动，其力量正逐渐壮大。

sentences.en: This movement lengthens your spine and tones the spinal nerves.
sentences.cn: 这一动作舒展脊椎，使脊神经更加强健。

sentences.en: This was my initiation into the peace movement.
sentences.cn: 这是我初次参加和平运动。

sentences.en: We've seen them all crowing that the movement is dead.
sentences.cn: 我们看到他们所有人都为那场运动的覆灭而洋洋自得。

words.tran_cn: 动产的；可移动的；不固定的
原动力；鼓动者；搬运公司；搬家工人
移动，移动到；感动（move的过去式，过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 运动，活动，调遣，逐渐变化，进步，增减，乐章，机件
trans.tran_en: a group of people who share the same ideas or beliefs and who work together to achieve a particular aim
